mapper.sql: e.Emp_Id, e.Position_Id, e.Outlets_Id, e.Emp_number, e.User_Name, e.Pass_word, e.Phone, e.Identity_cards, e.Address, e.Z_photographs, e.F_photographs, e.Emp_Name, e.AddTime, e.UpdateName, e.UpdateTime, e.DeleteName, e.DeleteTime, e.TimeLiness
mapper.select: select , o.Outlets_Name,o.Outlets_Id,p.Position_Name,p.Position_Id from emp e inner join outlets o on e.Outlets_Id=o.Outlets_Id left join per_position p on e.Position_Id=p.Position_Id where e.TimeLiness = 0

select Emp_Id, Position_Id, Outlets_Id, Emp_number, User_Name, Pass_word, Phone, Identity_cards, Address, Z_photographs, F_photographs, Emp_Name, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness from lms.emp where Emp_Id = #{empId}

select Emp_Id, Position_Id, Outlets_Id, Emp_number, User_Name, Pass_word, Phone, Identity_cards, Address, Z_photographs, F_photographs, Emp_Name, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness from lms.emp limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lms.emp(Position_Id, Outlets_Id, Emp_number, User_Name, Pass_word, Phone, Identity_cards, Address, Z_photographs, F_photographs, Emp_Name, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values (#{positionId}, #{outletsId}, #{empNumber}, #{userName}, #{passWord}, #{phone}, #{identityCards}, #{address}, #{zPhotographs}, #{fPhotographs}, #{empName}, #{addtime}, #{updatename}, #{updatetime}, #{deletename}, #{deletetime}, #{timeliness})

insert into lms.emp(Position_Id, Outlets_Id, Emp_number, User_Name, Pass_word, Phone, Identity_cards, Address, Z_photographs, F_photographs, Emp_Name, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values
(#{entity.positionId}, #{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.empNumber}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.passWord}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.identityCards}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.zPhotographs}, #{entity.fPhotographs}, #{entity.empName}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness})

insert into lms.emp(Position_Id, Outlets_Id, Emp_number, User_Name, Pass_word, Phone, Identity_cards, Address, Z_photographs, F_photographs, Emp_Name, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values
(#{entity.positionId}, #{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.empNumber}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.passWord}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.identityCards}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.zPhotographs}, #{entity.fPhotographs}, #{entity.empName}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness})
on duplicate key update Position_Id = values(Position_Id) , Outlets_Id = values(Outlets_Id) , Emp_number = values(Emp_number) , User_Name = values(User_Name) , Pass_word = values(Pass_word) , Phone = values(Phone) , Identity_cards = values(Identity_cards) , Address = values(Address) , Z_photographs = values(Z_photographs) , F_photographs = values(F_photographs) , Emp_Name = values(Emp_Name) , AddTime = values(AddTime) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , TimeLiness = values(TimeLiness)
mapper.update:
update lms.emp
Position_Id = #{positionId},
Outlets_Id = #{outletsId},
Emp_number = #{empNumber},
User_Name = #{userName},
Pass_word = #{passWord},
Phone = #{phone},
Identity_cards = #{identityCards},
Address = #{address},
Z_photographs = #{zPhotographs},
F_photographs = #{fPhotographs},
Emp_Name = #{empName},
AddTime = #{addtime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness},
where Emp_Id = #{empId}
